title: Did a Mother ‘Blow the Head Off’ a Pedophile Attempting to Rape Her Child?
subtitle: An account of a Georgia woman who fatally shot a burglar in her home was embellished with fabricated elements by a fake news purveyor.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: A notorious pedophile was killed by a mother who blew his head off with a shotgun when he tried to rape her 12-year-old child.
